MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the L19 postcode area of Liverpool. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:05am due to an unsafe situation on Woolton Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:57am on 22nd October
